title: Organizers
subtitle: Meet the people leading the Airflow Korea User Group

intro.title: Meet Our Team
intro.description: Get to know the organizers who are building the Airflow Korean User Group together. Each contributes to community development based on their expertise and experience.

community.title: Community Manager
community.description: Responsible for overall community operations and communication between members.

event.title: Event Planner
event.description: Plans and organizes events such as meetups, workshops, and conferences.

content.title: Content Curator
content.description: Reviews technical content and provides high-quality information.

recruitment.title: We're Looking for New Organizers!
recruitment.description: Want to grow with the Airflow Korea User Group? We're looking for passionate and dedicated new organizers.
